name: EDD Multilingual
author: OnTheGoSystems

sections.description:
EDD Multilingual lets you run light-weight and digital shops, with electronice-only delivery, in multiple languages.

Easy Digital Downloads Multilingual is the glue plugin, which is providing seamless integration between Easy-Digital-Downloads and WPML.

Contribute

If you spot any bug or have idea for useful feature feel free to contribute via GitHub.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘edd-multilingual’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

This is a glue plugin between EDD and WPML. You need to have both in order for this plugin to do anything.
